reg_info.act_under: Nursing Homes Act   Loi sur les maisons de soins infirmiers

content.content: 1. A temporary decrease between January 1, 2003 and June 30, 2005 in the number of residents residing in a nursing home classified as a “B”, “C” or “D” nursing home is prescribed as an extraordinary event in respect of which the Minister may make an additional grant to a licensee for the purposes of section 20.14 of the Act. O. Reg. 427/02, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. A temporary decrease between January 1, 2003 and June 30, 2005 in the number of residents residing in a nursing home classified as a “B”, “C” or “D” nursing home is prescribed as an extraordinary event in respect of which the Minister may make an additional grant to a licensee for the purposes of section 20.14 of the Act. O. Reg. 427/02, s. 1.

content.content: 2. Omitted (provides for the revocation of this Regulation). O. Reg. 427/02, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. Omitted (provides for the revocation of this Regulation). O. Reg. 427/02, s. 2.

content.content: 3. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 427/02, s. 3.
content.raw_html: 3. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 427/02, s. 3.
